replies.body: Nice job on the Rubber Boy Mundo.
Wow, non-Riot artwork that looks like Riot artwork

> [{quoted}](name=Sassmast3r,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hXHzJabr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-11T01:30:37.984+0000)
>
> Wow, non-Riot artwork that looks like Riot artwork

That's because the guy has worked with Riot before.
The artist has already made images (not splashart) for Riot

Rubber Boy Mundo.

Latex Legend Mundo.

Semen Demon Mundo.

(Yes these are all stolen jokes please don't sue me)

10/ 10... I saw a fan artist do Hextech Janna and I wish they'd replace that with it. (These fans be makin good art.)

If anyone needs a splash update tho, its gotta be sivir, like eew.
The creator already posted this didnt he?

always bothered me that he doesn't have a studded paddle for this skin >.>

or a ball gag

I love when pictures tell a story. Inspired me to write a fake skin bio for it:

> Folklore speaks of a mad executioner that lives in the ruins of an old town, an inhuman brute who drags away his victims for perceived "crimes". Whatever the perceived felony, great or small, the sentence is invariably death by beheading.

Gimp suit mundo no more!

Now it's just all around BDSM
I love that he included Ryze in this. Being dragged to the guillotine is a metaphor for the rework.
Rito hire this man even though I fucking hate Mundo
